channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- YouTube Embed, Playlist and Popup by WpDevArt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- YouTube Embed, Playlist and Popup by WpDevArt

item.title: CVE-2021-24464|2024-08-03T19:35:19.608Z -- unknown -- youtube%20embed%2C%20playlist%20and%20popup%20by%20wpdevart
item.description: The YouTube Embed, Playlist and Popup by WpDevArt WordPress plugin before 2.3.9 did not escape, validate or sanitise some of its shortcode options, available to users with a role as low as Contributor, leading to an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
